content: belma socks are elegant everyday socks featuring a subtle textured stitch pattern that flows beautifully along the leg and foot the pattern is very easy and memorizable the vertical texture adds visual interest while confirming an excellent fit making these socks both comfortable and engaging to knit worked from the cuff down belma socks include a classic heel flap and gusset for durability and a well-shaped fit the pattern is written for magic loop and is suitable for knitters who enjoy simple texture without heavy chart reading the design shines in solid or lightly tonal yarns allowing the stitch pattern to take center stage while contrasting heels and toes add a modern touch size adult needles 2 5 mm us 1 5 difficulty beginner
